thread.title: Your Groove has been revamped as Microsoft gives their Music app a new look
thread.title_full: Your Groove has been revamped as Microsoft gives their Music app a new look

author: Jez Corden
title: Your Groove has been revamped as Microsoft gives their Music app a new look
text:
Groove Music has picked up a fairly large update on the Fast Ring, bringing some UI changes and other optimizations.
The update began rolling out in phases to users in the Fast Ring a few days ago, but should now appear for everyone in both the Fast and Slow Rings. If you do not see the update yet, you shouldn't have to wait too long.
The update brings the usual "seems faster" performance enhancements, along with some UI tweaks and an overhaul of the "Your Groove" tab, which has now been renamed.
